last_episode_to_air.name: Wheels Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: Eileen’s vintage RV allows for a long-awaited reunion between Abby and Danielle, but will the star-crossed lovers know what to do next? (Featuring guest cast Mouzam Makkar).

name: Easy Abby
overview: Sleeping with women comes easy to Abby. Dealing with her personal life? Not so much. Follow Abby through her trials and tribulations in the Revry Original Series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Abby is in a free-fall after her love Danielle returns to Italy

episodes.name: Portable Feast
episodes.overview: Abby has never been in love and doesn't want to be! When she bumps into a former fling but can't remember the woman's name, Abby starts to wonder if she has what it takes to fall in love.

episodes.name: Pies the Limit
episodes.overview: Abby is forced into a double blind date with a woman she's actually already been with before as Sara and Carolyn's dinner party starts getting very warm in the center but cooling around the edges.

episodes.name: Naming the Baby
episodes.overview: After a rigorous one night stand, Abby can't get her high-energy guest lover to leave the apartment. Meanwhile, best pal Sara assumes her girlfriend is cheating on her so she decides to hide out at Abby's for awhile.

episodes.name: Bacon and Legs
episodes.overview: Sara wakes up on Abby's couch with a love hangover and Abby tries to cheer her up with new girls and greasy brunch.

episodes.name: Danish Twist
episodes.overview: Sara sinks deeper into her breakup confusion at breakfast and starts stuffing herself with donuts. The waitress is pissy with Abby for blowing her off after a weekend fling in the Wisconsin Dells, but seems to forgive her when they cross paths in the restroom.

episodes.name: Love Monkey
episodes.overview: While working at the bike shop, Abby reluctantly admits to her friend Eileen that the reason she's feeling antsy and distracted has less to do with romance and more to do with her Mother.

episodes.name: No Fly Zone
episodes.overview: Nosy neighbor Lydia interrupts a sweet early morning in bed for Abby and her long-distance lover Haley with an interrogation about the garbage chute.

episodes.name: Martini in the Closet
episodes.overview: Abby tries to teach Sara how to pick up girls at the lesbian bar but gets distracted by a beautiful stranger. Eileen shows up and overwhelms Sara with beer and flattery.

episodes.name: Walk Before You Run
episodes.overview: Abby catches up with the Martini woman from the lesbian bar but finds herself suddenly shy as she walks her home. Sara and Eileen drink up a storm as "fun friends" with confusing results the next morning.

episodes.name: Icing on the Sponge Cake
episodes.overview: While tending bar at a reception with her buddy Stan, Abby can't resist a stunning request from the mother-of-the-bride.

episodes.name: How To Travel Light
episodes.overview: Abby goes to Danielle's apartment for the first time and is unprepared for some new romantic feelings.

episodes.name: The Meatball Test
episodes.overview: Bobbie and Lydia make dinner and try real hard not to talk about their open relationship. Meanwhile down the hall, Abby locks herself out of her apartment. In her underwear.

episodes.name: Chicago Free Fall
episodes.overview: In the Season One Finale, Detective Lydia tries to ask Abby out on a date but Abby is focused on Danielle, the first woman to ever truly spark Abby's heart, but will it be too late?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Abby is in a free-fall after her love Danielle returns to Italy

episodes.name: Dating While Depressed
episodes.overview: Abby is in the biggest funk of her life and hasn’t left her apartment in 2 weeks, so best pal Eileen tries to coax her out.

episodes.name: Spirits Were High
episodes.overview: Eileen gets stuck under a piano which forces Abby to come help her. Then in the midst of getting Eileen’s dating profile posted, Abby gets an urgent call about her Mother.

episodes.name: There Is No Middle
episodes.overview: While visiting the Psych Ward after her Mother’s manic depressive episode, Abby meets sexy troublemaker Alicia in the Snack Room. (Introducing Tuckie White as Alicia, Lia Mortensen as Marilyn Walker, and Meg Thalken as Nurse Lorna).

episodes.name: Sugar & Cigarettes
episodes.overview: Abby tries to sort out her mother’s treatment plan with a wise nurse and a jerk doctor, and bonds with flirting Alicia about family mental illness.

episodes.name: The Abby Principle
episodes.overview: While Abby gets her Mom released from the Psych Ward, her buddy Stan hosts a party where it turns out most of the guests have slept with Abby. Alicia shows up uninvited.

episodes.name: All Sorts Of Therapy
episodes.overview: Abby reluctantly moves back in with her Mom to save money for school, then Alicia convinces Abby to take her to a lesbian bar.

episodes.name: Thrush Is Also A Bird
episodes.overview: Abby takes Alicia's bait and winds up having a wild night with her, despite concerns about staying true to Danielle who is in Italy.

episodes.name: Return Policy
episodes.overview: Marilyn (Abby's Mom), attends group therapy but ends up having to wrangle the women back to order after the counselor abandons them

episodes.name: Funny In A Gay Way
episodes.overview: After going around the world with Alicia, Abby takes a breather by going to yoga and a comedy club with friends. But Alicia is an expert tracker. (Featuring guest cast Tamale Sepp, Shannon Noll, and Jessica Kadish).

episodes.name: Dr. Tuck Will See You Now
episodes.overview: Eileen accompanies Abby to the clinic after strenuous sex leaves her feeling a bit "itchy".

episodes.name: Patty The Pineapple
episodes.overview: Alicia wheedles her way into her Abby’s Mom’s good graces, and finds a new way to make a long-lasting impact on Abby’s life after their slumber party.

episodes.name: Rude Awakening
episodes.overview: Abby finally lets her guard down and seeks comfort from her Mother, after waking up to a bitter betrayal.

episodes.name: Cold Leftovers
episodes.overview: Detective Lydia Banks has to deal with a dysfunctional lesbian couple as they wait in a therapist lobby.

episodes.name: So Much All Of The Time
episodes.overview: Abby goes to an ecstasy-fueled party and starts to feel like her old self again. Then Danielle shows up unexpectedly. (Featuring guest cast Dalila Ali Rajah, Lianna Carrera, Julia Pels, Sapna Kumar, and Amy Dellagiarino).

episodes.name: Wheels Up
episodes.overview: Eileen’s vintage RV allows for a long-awaited reunion between Abby and Danielle, but will the star-crossed lovers know what to do next? (Featuring guest cast Mouzam Makkar).
